sentence.Network_en: Even the most gifted can have confidence destroyed by the wrong instructor.
sentence.Network_cn: 即使是最有天赋的人也可能会被错误的导师摧毁自信。

sentence.Network_en: She ran off with an intellectually challenged ski instructor.
sentence.Network_cn: 她和一个脑筋不太好使的滑雪教练私奔了。

sentence.Network_en: His sailing instructor fell overboard and drowned during a lesson.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的航海教练在一次训练课时从船上失足跌入水中，溺水身亡。

encyclopedia.content: instructor解释 instruct 教育，指导+-or者 n One who instructs; a teacher. 教员；教师 A college or university teacher who ranks below an assistant professor. 大学讲师学院或大学中级别低于副教授的教师辨析 teacher 是中小学老师 lecturer 是大学讲师，可以授课的，资深的叫senior lecturer instructor 是指指导员或者是非授课导师， 国外大学有生活导师， 帮你介绍怎么适应大学生活， 学业导师， 告诉你怎么合理选课，

entry.tran: 教练;指导者;(美国英语亦指)教师，大学讲师
entry.def: An instructor is someone who teaches a skill such as driving or skiing. In American English, instructor can also be used to refer to a schoolteacher or to a university teacher of low rank.

example.tran: 有正式资格的驾驶教练的指导

means.word_mean: 1. a person whose occupation is teaching

auth_sentence.content: I was a map-reading instructor in the army.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was a map-reading instructor in the army.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was a map-reading instructor in the army.

auth_sentence.content: There are moments where I feel like a driving instructor.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are moments where I feel like a driving instructor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are moments where I feel like a driving instructor.

industry勤奋+ious..的→industrious
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+ive表形容词→adj.有益的, 教育性的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 工业, 产业, 行业, 勤奋

instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+or人→n.指导者,教员
in内+stru=struct建立,结构+ment物→内部构造→仪器,工具
instrumental[adj.仪器的;器械的;乐器的;起作用的;有帮助的]+ity性质→n.手段

stems_affixes.value_cn: 基础,下部结构,地下建筑

struct建立,结构+ure表名词→n.结构,构造;建筑物 v.构造,建造

Sentence.sentence: Meanwhile, a second group was directed to solve the same problems by collaborating with one another, without any prompts from their instructor.

sentences.en: He was invited to sit on the rostrum as a representative of extramural instructors.
sentences.cn: 他以校外辅导员身份,被邀请到主席台上。

sentences.en: He doesn’t suffer fools gladly so he’s hardly the best person to be instructor on the beginner’s course.
sentences.cn: 他对傻里傻气的人没有耐心,因此他不太适合做基础课教师。
